Title: Suprakash Mukherjee | Personal Webpage
Name: Suprakash Mukherjee
Description: Student at BITS Pilani, batch of 2021.
Pursuing Masters in Engineering in Software Systems from the Department of CSIS, BITS Pilani - Pilani Campus.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: Code tinkerer, Roboticist & Imagineer, I believe in innovation, creation and building the non-existing.
I am passionate about Robotics and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Elon Musk.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
If you want to know more or wish to collaborate, go to my CV section or contact me directly through the contact details.
WorkContent: I am currently working as a Teaching Assistant (TA) in the Department of CSIS, BITS-Pilani, Pilani Campus alongside my masters coursework.
ProjectsStartLine: Some of the side projects I did can be found here :

Projects.name: A Scheme for QR Code Based Smart Door Locks Security System Using an ARM Computer | Published Nov 2016, Springer Singapore.

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
